A4.text: After the Sony acquisition, the company, now as Sony Mobile, moved its headquarters to Tokyo, Japan.

A5.text: On January 7, 2013, Sony Mobile completed moving its headquarters from Lund, Sweden to Tokyo, Japan in order to fully integrate with its parent company.
